author: makortel
body:
#### PR description:

This PR migrates `HcalTrigTowerGeometryESProducer` (the sole ESProducer in Geometry/HcalTowerAlgo package) to EventSetup consumes (#26584).

#### PR validation:

The code compiles.
title: Migrate HcalTrigTowerGeometryESProducer to EventSetup consumes
